content.detailedDescription: I was walking up to my  house  and i looked up and noticed a bright orange light. at first i thought it was a chinese lantern but realized it was moving too fast and the light was not flickering and it was way to bright for a lantern. i watched it move west towards lake michigan at least twice as fast as the aircraft i normally see in the sky and then the light got smaller really fast almost like it took off. feeling confused about what the heck i just saw i walked up my stairs and got my keys out and before i unlocked my door i glanced up and saw another orange light slightly brighter than the previous coming from the same direction which was ne heading in the same direction as the previous. this light moved at the same speed but occasionally it slowed down almost but not quite to a stop kinda like when somebody can't shift a manual transmission and it jerks.There was very light cloud cover but it went behind the clouds a couple times for a few seconds and instead of the light going out like when a normal plane goes behind a cloud it just illuminated the cloud to a faint but still extremely noticeable orange and just before i lost it behind the buildings in town in changed to white and seemed to be doing barrel rolls cause the light started to dim and rotate like a lighthouse. i stood on the sidewalk and smoked a cigarette mind racing about the possiblities of what i saw.W i then noticed 3 planes flying close to same altitude given all the lights were same size heading towards the lights which traveled towards lake michigan. i found that odd and noticed that there were 2 more coming from the se heading towards lake michigan. to wrap it up i've never seen lights like that moving like that and i've seen thousands of planes like that but never that many so close and near the same altitude
content.summary: 2 bright orange lights moving fast and occasionally slowing down shortly followed by a lot of planes

content.detailedDescription: Alder flat campground. orbs. about 2012.
content.summary: Orange orb

content.detailedDescription: The first time we saw it was the beginning of august i went outside to smoke a cigarette it was around 10 pm saw some planes flying that night and some shooting stars.The object just appeared all of a sudden over the tree tops in the distance to the north east i watched for about 10 min before i went inside to tell my girlfriend we witnessed the object flash orange red white green blue constantly the object also moved in a circular motion and then side to side the first night i observed it for about 1 hr my girlfriend was so creeped out that she only watched it for about 10 min the rest of the time i watched it in that time i observed it disappear and reappear.The second time i observed it the object was there for a short time before it disappeared and reappeared it did this a couple times that night tonight i went out and there it was to the northeast observed for about 5 min went back in about 30 min later it was gone this is not a plane or hellicopter.This has us creeped out made my hair stand up on end.
content.summary: Star like object to the northeast flashing several colors moving in a circle and then side to side seen on 2 other  nights object fadded out completely and returned several feet to the east .

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was abducted at 4 and 26 years of age.  since 1986 i became aware of small lights every night from dusk until around 9:30 pm.  i could never figure out what they were, so i photographed and filmed them getting up close to them with a zoom.  after videotaping them accumulating 1:03 of footage i still am baffled.  with my glasses on they look like saucers that are curved on the bottom.  they all sit at 45% and are all white with light, and show a slight elongated dome.  they are at times aspirin sized, but at times much smaller.  for past years they appear nearby over a main street about 40 feet high.  i consider them to be government projects, but i had a lot of encounter experience in my apartment, and 11 close encounter sightings in my area.  also there is a field nearby where i saw a lot of crop circles everyday for years, until a tree farm was made of it.

the mysterious objects i see every night i go out seem to appear from nowhere, hover for about 3 minutes then slowly travel northward for about 500 yards then make a sharp u turn; head southward then show a red and white blinking light.  i cannot figure out if they are airplanes or what.

mufon of oc did a 2 night investigation with me on similar type lights that went into its records as 'unknown' meaning ufo.  jan harzan the executive director of mufon told me this by phone in around 1997.  if any mufon investigator(s) would like to visit and talk to me then that would be most welcome.

the only proof i have of my experiences is my dvd, and 7 small dots on my left arm that form a perfect cross, and 12 perfect triangles.  i do not know how i got the dots, as i discovered them in 2005 while sitting in my bed.
content.summary: A brief summary of my experiences

content.detailedDescription: On sept. 5th a bit after 8 pm, my sister-in law, niece, her fiance and i were out on patio when we started seeing them, suddenly there were at least 20 all glowing in different shades of colors. we watched for a good 20 minutes just enjoying the show as they were like dancing glowing all at once. truly amazing to witness. so much so thoughts of getting pictures never entered our minds.
content.summary: 20 + orbs

content.detailedDescription: I did not witness this in person with my naked eyes it was only after i uploaded my photos to my computer that i noticed this object which sorta looks like a cloaking device from star trek almost..If someone could contact me through my email and let me know what it might be i would really appreciate it very much..I am attaching the photo with this report would love to hear from someone..This was taken at the chickamauga georgia battlefield nation park in georgia during afternoon hours by me there were no witnesses except my camera and me..
content.summary: I saw it on my film after i unloaded them onto my computer but didnt see it with naked eye

content.detailedDescription: Standing in my front window, waving to my son as he left. facing south, noticed a bright red/orange object in the sky, floating north. it was silent. object took a sharp 90 degree turn, heading west. 2 other objects joined after initial object changed directions. the three objects formed a giant triangle. i went outside to get a closer look, and to listen for noise. it was completely silent. objects headed west for approximately 5 minutes, when the rear two objects that flanked the first object vanished. the first object maintained a western path, headed toward the agawam/southwick area. the objects were no more than 500 ft off the ground.
content.summary: Bright red ball heading north. turned 90 degrees, heading west, when 2 other identicle objects joined to form a large triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
Visiting.
just sitting there over the homes to the east.
second take i couldn't believe my eyes it was so clear and visible.
lenticular with dome.  chart; c4, m1, p1.
color dull metallic like flat,brown-copper tone and darker on top.
had two windows on the dome that was kind of square.
was surprised.  very clear in broad daylight.  just, wow!
was there thought maybe two minutes but less.
just rose and disappeared.

storms in the area, heavy rain and winds, was a strange day.
content.summary: Looking out window at rear of home we were at.  hovering over homes and field to the east, forest area too.

content.detailedDescription:
Following information by time..
1123pm i was outside with the dog, on side porch
1125pm   a very clear evening and looking around noticed a very bright star like orb in the ne , size of a pen end.
at first i thought it was a pulsating star, but in further observation it was different.
1125pm a red light came on on the east side of the starlike orb just for a few seconds and then off
1128  a brilliant blue flash from the bottom of the object to the west side of the object and it never came on again
1133 pm  one more red flash and the object changed elevation  close to a 50 to 100 foot drop.

1137 the object began to get smaller and smaller <perhaps climbing in altitude> and finally disappeared
the sky was clear, visibility 10 miles and temperature at that time was 52 degrees.
i do live in the country, very familiar with the aircraft in the area<retired air force>, and no obstructions in the observation.
i am retired and a fi with mufon for a number of years.
content.summary: Observed starlike orb in ne sky in late evening

content.detailedDescription: I noticed what looked to be a group of geese flying in a v formation directly north of my position. the more i watched this group, 8-10 objects, the more i realized that they were'nt geese. this group flew in a westerly direction, and while the group were moving, the objects would "bounce" from one position to another, changing the shape of the formation from a v, to a triangle, to a somewhat cross shape, to an irregular circle. i observed the group for approximately a minute until it was out of sight. i took 2 pics of the group. at first i didn't think i caught the group, but when zooming in, you can see it.
content.summary: A formation of dull white objects over natrona county, wy

content.detailedDescription: When i was a child i spent the summers with my father on his small farm in warroad minnesota, this summer night in particular i and some relatives were laying in the field talking and looking up at the stars. i noticed that one "star" in particular seemed to be moving and as i watched i got my cousins attention to show him but he wasn't interested, he said "it's just a satellite". his assessment was perfectly acceptable and i had never seen a satellite before so i continued to watch as it slowly made its way across the sky. suddenly the object accelerated to what seemed like an unbelievable speed, it covered a distance of approximately one or two miles in a flash then stopped and changed course from an easterly direction to the south in an instant until it was out of sight. i was so excited, i jumped up and asked "did you see that?" to my utter disappointment no-one had. when i tried to describe what i saw no-one would believe me. moments later my father came outside to ask if any of us wanted to drive to town with him to get ice cream and i volunteered. when we got in the car i began telling him about what i saw, right from the start he wouldn't listen, he thought i was trying to play some kind of joke. this is where it gets strange for me, i've had some confusion over this as to why and how for many years. as my dad and i were arguing over this i happened to look up through the moonroof and i was astonished to see this thing rite in the middle of the glass and keeping what seemed to be perfect pace with the vehicle. i started screaming at me dad "look up, look,it's there". he refused, absolutely would not believe me even in the moment as it was happening. i kept an eye on it as it followed along with us toward town for maybe half mile then just like earlier it suddenly accelerate like a shot then stopped on a dime and changed course. i was so excited,bewildered,and amazed and yet i was angry and disappointed. why? what would it have took for him to just look up? only for a moment, it would have taken away the confusion and my own creeping doubt. i never saw it again after that and i've only told this to my stepbrother(who ridiculed me) and to my son who i felt it would be safe to tell, he's 12years old.
content.summary: Object headed e approximately 1-2 mile sudden stop and course change s without slowing. minutes later observed same object directly over our car, e ward

content.detailedDescription: As stated above, that's what i saw. i got a more detailed description of the preceding that i didn't see later, along with a hand drawing of the shape of the formation, etc. there were lots of people outside at the time in the dpl parking lot, the parking area to the east, and the kroger parking lot north thereof that could have also seen the same. temperature was about 60, no wind, possibly higher altitude thin partial clouding but mostly clear and visibility was very good. the movement, coloration, and presence was obvious. the other witness that i talked to did not discern the flickering that i did. but i did not see the first part of the sighting.
content.summary: After the socrates cafe meeting at the dpl i was noticed by one other attendee of possible ufo activity outside preceding outside i saw the last 5 oballs slowly flying west, the one and at least 2 or 3 other witnesses saw 15 or more, in formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my husband, we were doing our usual tour of sequim, port angeles and elwha, we enjoy the scenery and take lots of photos. it was our first time viewing the elwha river from highway 101 - there is a stop along the road where you get a really good view.  we both did not notice the object at the time of taking the photos, the object was only seen once i started viewing them on my computer. at the time of taking the photos i don't remember seeing anything unusual, however, i wear glasses and am using a digital camera where you view the image on a small screen, and my camera was on maximum zoom. however even when not using the camera i don't recall seeing anything hovering around the trees, which makes these photos even stranger.  there were no weird noises at the time either. 
i have other strange photos taken in this very same area too, but this is by far the best one.
i enclose photos, the originals and cropped zoom of the object.
content.summary: Egg shaped object hovers over elwha river

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It has been for the last 2 nights i used a tablet and got video of it on the 24th and took pictures last night on 25th.  i was at my girlfriends parents house for he sisters birthday party, they live on lake ontario,pyane beach.  i went out at dusk to see if i could finally see the little dipper.  i live in city and just can't see it anymore.  i saw something on horizon at first i thought it was a bug or something, with the way it moved then realized it was way out there, but it shot towards me.  i asked "m"'s father to come look he could not see it.  "m" came out and saw it instantly. i grabbed their binoculars and could see a round object with lights flashing red and green.  "m"'s mom looked through them and saw it too.  we were in process of leaving so we did.  i got home to rochester and walked out back and realized i could see one from back yard and another one to east.  i then called my friend who lives near the lake out this way kevin and went to his place got his binoculars and he saw it to.  ended up recording them from my back yard with "m"'s tablet knew i could not see them in normal mode but could turn up gamma and play with brightness and maybe would have some luck.  that is how i got them flying a plane at the bright one over rochester.  so the next morning i called my parents get them to drop off 2 sets of binoculars and my dad's 10 mp pentax camera.  i was at lake by dusk the next night and  had some trouble remembering how to set shutter speed and other stuff  could not get a picture for first hour and a half maybe more.  missed choppers flying up to them and everything.  but got it working just don't really have a great telephoto lens for the job.  got the drive got the objects just don't have the equipment hope you all can come like right now i hope they are back tonight.  her parents said they see stuff up at lake all the time.  [link moved to fi section/cms/tg] my photoes and 1 video is there
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw first  one at lake then realized there were many over lake and rochester area

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling east of pueblo county i observed multiple reflective objects making 
irrational movements disappearing and reappearing and eventually vanishing into thin air 
air planes were in the area and the objects did not resemble anything i have ever observed 
unfortunately i was unable to get video or photo evidence but this happened 2 other times so 
i will try to be prepared next time.
content.summary: Silver reflective object observed to the east above pueblo county this is not the first time sometimes there are up to three of these objects disappearing and reappearing also making un natural movements to known physics .

content.detailedDescription: I got up to use the bathroom at 3:43 am, looked out the bathroom window and saw what i thought was a very bright star. then upon closer look, noticed the various colors and knew that it was not a star. i think it was moving further away then stopped all movement high in the sky. just hovered with no noise. i watched it through my binoculars for a long time then woke my wife to see it. it stayed there until the morning light overpowered the sighting. could still be there. going to check again tonight and call officials if i see it again. i know it was not a satellite,station, or anything else that could be expected.
content.summary: I got up to use the bathroom at 3:43 am, looked out the bathroom window and saw what i thought was a bright star. they upon closer look, noticed the lights. i  watched thru binoculars and woke my wife to see it. it stayed until dawn.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, i speak french (sorry for my bad english) and i live in saint-georges beauce, québec, canada and i have a video of a light beam from ufo on my hunting camera in the wood i put this camera to watch my camper from thief or capting some intersting image and i was surprise to see this awesome video of ufo light beam i'm so happy to have this great video :) now all of my family and friends believes me.



i can see a beam and over my camper in the woods frem my hunting camera its the ufo scanning my camper in the wood i see the cercle of the beam doesnt change his shape when its coming on the top of my camper and i see some hole in the circle light beam very strange too and i see some light verticaly coming in the front of the camera sometimes and i think its the ufo turning slowly over my hunting camera glasses and the light near the ufo appears in the front of the camera and this is what i think it was the verticaly light.

my hunting camera start when something hot like humain or animals pass near the sensor of my camera so i think the beam was hot and solid.

i have many photos of ufo and you have 2 photos from me of ufo triangle and cercle i send you in 2009 (larry) i have other ufo photos at this time but this video is awesome and i have seen humanoid alien too and i was on the alien planet in 1984 very impressive experience.

i dont want you to show my video on internet or youtube...  at this moment please.

if you (mufon) need to ask me more question contact me!

keep my personal information secret please.

i have some photo from day and a codec to see the video clearely.

thank you!

larry
content.summary: Light beam of ufo captured on hunting camera

content.detailedDescription: Saw disc/ saucer shaped object in sky as i ascended an uphill grade on i- 95 in ri heading to ct. it caught our attention because it shone in the sun. it reflected the light of the sun. we had no other thoughts as to what it was because of the way it disappeared. it was there and then it was gone. blew my mind. i'm sure of the date because my wife and i wee on our way back to ct from cape cod after our honeymoon. the previous week was very rainy but on the date we returned, it was a brilliant june day.
content.summary: Saw disc shaped object in the sky as i drove from rhode island to ct on i 95

content.detailedDescription:
1) - i was on my terrace where i normally sleep watching my sitcoms.
2) - a flash/strobe of light got my attention.The light was huge and i feared thunders which normally follows by rains. so i looked up in the sky & was amazed to witness sequnaces of lights.
3) - i have never witnessed what i witnessed that night. it was a first and unique experience.
4) - the objects/lights where really huge and far as they travelled slow from east to south east. they where easily over 10, some of them where emiting light and some of them where dull.
5) - i was excited and scared, i took several photos however my mobile could snap a good one. i can share rest too.
6) - it faded of in distance
content.summary: Giant motherships witnessed, photo proof of 3 of them together

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend had taken the dogs out for a walk before bed, and he came in and calmly told me to put my shoes on and come outside. when i walked out onto our front porch, we looked southeast at 127 degrees, and there was a large "star-like" (i only say star because it wasn't a distinct shape, it seemed more like a diamond or just flashes of light) and rainbow colored. it was pulsating and flashing different colors in a precise order. at first i really did think it was just an airplane and even laughed about it because i thought my boyfriend had mistaken it, but it didn't move. not at all. it was completely silent and literally perfectly still. i am an avid believer in extra-terrestrial intelligent life from other planets, and i actually receive emails from mufon, but i have to be honest, i was racking my brain trying to think of anything else this might have been. i didn't want to get too excited about it and then find out it was just some military craft or maybe the international space station. but ive seen the space station in the sky before and this did not look anything like that. not even close. the colors were so bright. after getting my fill of watching it, i got cold and my dogs were getting impatient so i went back inside. after about an hour or so i came back out to check on the object and it was gone.
content.summary: Rainbow colored flashing/pulsating diamond in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a movie when i notice a flashing light outside of my second story window, left me in shock
content.summary: Flashing white sphere that moving back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
Just stepped out on my deck to enjoy a glass of wine. object appeared in the southern sky appx. 8:20 pm pst. sky was dark. height initially was appx. horizon.
circular in shape, the object moved on a northern course, above reno, over my head and disappeared  due to my house blocking the path. there was no sound. no 3d shape was discernible because the sky was black. object was circular like a disc. color was a very pale blue/grey and pulsated at appx. 72 pulses per min. 
i could not guess the altitude and therefore unable to guess the speed at which it traveled. regardless, the movement was very fast. not like a meteor but fast no matter the altitude.
the size remained the same throughout the sighting.
initially i thought it an aircraft in the clouds but there were no clouds. i ruled out aircraft as the pulses were more rapid than strobe lights.
my wife was an additional witness to this sighting.
i had no odd feelings or sensations. only awe. 
no time for a photo but what we saw was similar to the sept. 14 2014 florida sighting.
i called the local nbc  tv station and inquired as to anyone reporting this sighting. they had no one reporting a sighting. the person who took my report said they would notify the stations meteorologist. i am an ex corporate pilot and can assure you this was no meteorological incident.
content.summary: Appeared south of reno, traveled very fast northward,pulsates appx 72/min.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke when my i saw my dogs attention was focused on the sky,i looked up and saw something falling from the sky,  it had a jet like trail behind it, it was falling at a rapid speed with crazy flashing lights,  very random, very bright, the first though i had was that something is wrong, am i really witnessing a plane crash right now,  there is no way it was a meteor, the trail wassmoke but not in straight line it wavered and wobbled,the lights were white and red but flashed very randomly and very bright,it was very clear to me something was falling at a very fast rate and definitely going to impact, i did not see imp,,act as it was lost in the horizon behind houses and trees, i had the instant feeling that this was not normal and that something was wrong. immediately following the sighting,there was lots of air traffic in the area multiple airplanes and a chopper, there is no way i am the only person in edmonton that saw this i assure you, maybe it was a plane,  but it was no meteor.
content.summary: Something falling from sky trail of smoke and bright random lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in yard just happened to look up seen two flashing red lights with no sound with a red and white light flashing beside it seemed to be folowing it both never made a sound damniest thing i ever seen
content.summary: Flashing 2 red lights then other thing following red and white flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: On 9/22/14 monday night about 9:30 pm from the se direction i saw a ufo. i was sitting in my chair chanting (mantra meditation). from the south direction moving east towards where i was sitting a bright white round light moving slow. from the round bright light come out a dark blue edges on each side with small red lights it was very beautiful. the object did not move for about 15-20 sec. there was no noise. it did not fly off into the distance. it disappear into or doorway in the sky  and it was gone. when i first saw this  glowing object i thought its just like the other one i see. but this is the first time i saw a blue ufo coming out of the glowing bright white light. i was amazed to see its beauty.
content.summary: On 9/22/14 at 9:30 pm i saw a ufo appear from bright light then disappeared moving easterly direction.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside of my apartment going to my car, to go to a gas station. approaching my vehicle i noticed a light above me. having my phone i took a short video of a orb of light circling. at first i though it was a beacon of light hitting the clouds at the right angle to make the object look like it was an orb. however i ruled that out after watching it for a few minutes. i know it was not an aircraft or helicopter, based of my knowledge of being an air traffic controller for the air force, the way the light looked and they way it moved. the video was poor due to the iphone 4's ability and the fact that i was tracing the movement of the object, instead of keeping it stationary. after about five minutes i decided to continue what i was doing losing interest. coming back 15 minutes later, it was gone.
content.summary: Orb circling

content.detailedDescription: Looking out the window, noticed bright light. went outside and watched light for at least 30 mins. light did not move much, but flashed constantly from white to red to ble. when it did move a little it had white lights trailing behind it. it was facisnating to watch. called an friend who said she had seen a red light flashing in the sky also about 20 mins prior to my sighting.
content.summary: Bright light flashing in sky, from white to red and blue. remained stationary, but moved a little with light trailing behind it.

content.detailedDescription: I had taken a short walk down my street to photograph fall colors of my neighbors trees. i took seven pictures, came back home and downloaded them onto my computer. it was then i saw it above the largest tree. it only appeared in one picture. i did not see it at the time i took the picture.
content.summary: Taking fall color picxs and noticed object when i downloaded the pics on my computer

content.detailedDescription: I have tried to contact az department but have not heard from them. lights were just to south of us in a cloud and moving all over the cloud and coming together but not touching ,my wife also saw them. i took 68 photos in 1 hr and 38 min. they stayed within the cloud all the time. sent the photos to local tv investigator asking their weather people if it might have been a weather thing,have not heard from them yet. i had gone out to take in my flag when i noticed them,went in and got wife to come out and look.Got my camera and started taking pic. objects went to the edges of the cloud formation,then came back toward each other,kept repeating this during the whole time.When the lightening happened you could see that they were in the cloud itself. was scared during the whole time,but fascinated by what they were doing,like they were charging themselfs up and coming together and sharing the energy.
content.summary: 2 lights in sky duraaaaaaaa@àng thunder storm

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were standing in the driveway, it was january 2010.  i noticed a strange star, it stuck out immediately.  it was holding still, as stars do and shined as such however it was a bit brighter.  i pointed it out to her and she looked up and noticed it immediately.   the light grew brighter as it appeared to descend, hovered for a moment then shot off into the upper atmosphere/space.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Star like object high moving then zipping away
